/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with modern buildings, their glass and steel facades reflecting the clear blue sky. A large concrete overpass arches over the street, adding to the urban feel of the scene. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, with the blue sky contrasting with the greenery of the trees and bushes lining the street.
